author: dlr
msg: Cross-link some useful pages, and add a new query to the "Upcoming"
section of the status page.
* www/project_status.html
Add a link for issues under consideration for 2.0.0, with big fat
warnings.
* www/project_tasks.html
Link to issue queries present on project_status.html, and to
roadmap.html, with an explanation of what can be found there.  While
somewhat redundant with the left nav, this is useful navigation to
anyone interested in major milestones in Subversion's vision.

author: dlr
msg: * www/project_tools.html: Correct spelling of "Road map".

author: rooneg
msg: Fix a pool management problem in ra_dav's replay implementation.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/replay.c
(start_element): Stop destroying the file pool at the start of a new
directory, it was already destroyed when the last directory pool was
destroyed at the end of the previous directory, and destroying it
twice is bad.

author: dlr
msg: * notes/commit-access-templates/full-committer.tmpl
Add a note about adding a new full committer to the "svn" user group
on tigris.org.

author: rooneg
msg: Port the ra_dav portion of r19314 to ra_serf.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/replay.c
(svn_ra_serf__replay): Replay runs against the session url, not the vcc,
so that we can infer the base dir from it.
